availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carroll County farmer. Indiana native. Married Martha Harsin Lee in 1853. Father of William A. Lee.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District 2, p. 422. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District 2, p. 49. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Locust, p. 4. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registrations, 1863-1865, Ancestry, Kentucky, Sixth Congressional District, Carroll County, 1863, p. 147. Kentucky, Marriage Records, 1852-1914, Ancestry, Carroll County, 1853.
